sqlMap.statement: INSERT INTO EPG_CONTENT_VOTE (ID, CONTENT_TYPE, CONTENT_CODE, GOOD_COUNT) VALUES (EPG_CONTENT_VOTE_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #CONTENT_TYPE#, #CONTENT_CODE#,1)
INSERT INTO EPG_CONTENT_VOTE (ID, CONTENT_TYPE, CONTENT_CODE, BAD_COUNT) VALUES (EPG_CONTENT_VOTE_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #CONTENT_TYPE#, #CONTENT_CODE#,1)
UPDATE EPG_CONTENT_VOTE SET GOOD_COUNT = GOOD_COUNT + 1 WHERE CONTENT_TYPE=#CONTENT_TYPE# AND CONTENT_CODE=#CONTENT_CODE#
UPDATE EPG_CONTENT_VOTE SET BAD_COUNT = BAD_COUNT + 1 WHERE CONTENT_TYPE=#CONTENT_TYPE# AND CONTENT_CODE=#CONTENT_CODE#

INSERT INTO EPG_VOTE_RECORD (ID, USER_MAC, CONTENT_TYPE, CONTENT_CODE, VOTE_METHOD, VOTE_VAL, VOTE_TIME) VALUES (EPG_VOTE_RECORD_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #USER_MAC#, #CONTENT_TYPE#, #CONTENT_CODE#,#VOTE_METHOD#, #VOTE_VAL#, #VOTE_TIME#)
SELECT * FROM EPG_CONTENT_VOTE WHERE CONTENT_TYPE=#CONTENT_TYPE# AND CONTENT_CODE=#CONTENT_CODE#

SELECT COUNT(*) as NUM FROM EPG_VOTE_RECORD WHERE USER_MAC = #USER_MAC# AND VOTE_METHOD = #VOTE_METHOD# AND VOTE_TIME >= DATE_FORMAT(#BEGIN_TIME#,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AND VOTE_TIME <= DATE_FORMAT(#END_TIME#,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
SELECT A.*,B.TITLE FROM EPG_CONTENT_VOTE A,EPG_CONTENT_PROGRAM B WHERE A.CONTENT_CODE=B.CONTENT_CODE ORDER BY A.GOOD_COUNT DESC
